author: mloenko
msg: Fixed tests that did not restore environment like security manager or set of providers
Change allowed running security tests with forkmode "once"

author: anathaniel
msg: XSP block: Use private methods to call start/endElement in xsp.xsl.
That generates smaller bytecode allowing to compiler larger XSPs before hitting the
64k limit for the size of the generate() method.

author: jeremias
msg: Added a changes page generated from status.xml
